name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of August 31, "What do young people who stop paying social security think" topped the Weibo hot search list, and netizens expressed their views on why they stopped paying social security.
One netizen replied: "I hope they don't even give us money, but they still want us to retire"
"I just don't want to be a leek of the regime, and I don't see how good the future is."
"I don't think it's necessary to pay after Japan discharges nuclear wastewater"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The lament from the owner of the unfinished building:
I went to the supermarket to buy water for one yuan. If they don’t give me water, I can call the police
I bought a house for 1.5 million yuan. If they don’t give me water, they will lie down. If I go to the streets, I will be a thug. Is there any justice?
In the eyes of my girl, I am a bad guy. I don’t want to go to the streets. I just want a house. I am a legal citizen. Is there anything wrong with that? Who took my money?
